entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 6.
